summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1474, for the improvement of 25th Avenue Northeast from East 54th Street to Northern Pacific Railway right of way all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15795 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
